dialogues.text: Oh, hi. I'm Phyrrus, watcher of the Beacon. A storm extinguished most of the torches last night. Do you think you could help me out here?

options.text: Sure, what do I need to do?

dialogues.text: Well, you see, the torches use each others' heat to stay lit. It means that for them to stay lit, you must light all of them at the same time.
Each torch will extinguish after 15 seconds. So, you must light all torches in the room within 15 seconds. Did you get that?
Great! Take this candle and matchbox. To light unlit sources, you can right-click on the unlit item while having an ignition source in your inventory. Good luck!
Thanks! The Beacon is now fully lit again!
I would like to share an ability with you that may help you get around faster!
'Burning Haste' will increase your movement speed, while also burning enemies that hit you!
You're most welcome here, traveler. I hope to see you again soon!
